Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Recent news stories show an optimistic shift in Australia's economy and support for essential services workers. The federal budget's extensive renewable energy funds and historic aged care worker pay rise indicates a commitment to sustainability and care services. However the cost of living remains a national concern with people struggling to keep up with expenses and interest rate hikes. Meanwhile debate persists as to whether spending restraint will be the answer to recession-proofing the country.
